body_html: @dvyukov I ran the mnist training example distributed with Tensorflow (it's Python, but it exercises the C++ code). Unfortunately Reviewable swallowed the comment with the exact command line. Note that you need to have a machine with more than 16 vcores and no GPU enabled to see the contention.
